name: Fartpoop Simulator 2
description:
Fartpoop Simulator is back and better than ever! Returning with 4 NEW characters, brand new music, and a new game mode, Fartpoop Simulator 2 aims to be the definitive bathroom simulation experience.

-------------------------------------------------

THE RULES ARE SIMPLE:

Press F to fart, and press P to Poop. Nothing more, nothing less.

-------------------------------------------------

GAME MODES:

FREE MODE - Feel free to fart and poop to your heart's content. Nothing is on the line here.

TIME ATTACK - In this mode you're put against a timer to test your endurance in the bathroom. You're presented with a score, and will need to reach that score to progress further in the mode before your time runs out. Good luck!

-------------------------------------------------

With a cast of wacky characters, and music that puts a fart sample to the test, Fartpoop Simulator 2 will have you hooked!
